com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Interface DbHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSqlHandler, JdbcHandler, MysqlJdbcHandler, SqliteJdbcHandler, TestSqlHandler

    public interface DbHandler
    The interface between Zeidon OE and the databases.
    Author:
    DG

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOAD_DONE 
      static int LOAD_NO_ENTITIES 
      static String ROOT_ENTITY
      This is used in the qualification object to indicate that the qualification is for the root entity.

        int loadEntity(View view,
             EntityDef entityDef)
        Load all viewEntities under the parent.
        Parameters:
        view - View being activated.
        entityDef -
        Returns:
        LOAD_DONE (0) - Entities loaded OK LOAD_NO_ENTITIES (1) - No entities loaded.

      • getKeysGeneratedByDb

        List<Object> getKeysGeneratedByDb()
        Returns any new keys created by the DB as part of an insert. Ignored by dbhandlers that use genkey handlers.
        Returns:

      • setDbGenerateKeys
